name: No Second Chances!
description:
DISCLAIMER: This game needs online to function correctly. See below why :)

No Second Chances! The interactive Quiz Show is now live on your recieving device!

The Rules are simple:
There are three categories with 10 questions each. You have one try.

Controls are Mouse/Touch only.

This game (if everything goes as planned) stores your answers and Profile on a Server to show them in other peoples games. Likewise, you get to play along other people too! Isn't that awesome!

Bugs are to be expected, please report them here: https://github.com/dalton5000/No-Second-Chances/issues
